review: This is the 2nd Apple TV device I have purchased.  The first one I purchased to use at home to stream audio from iPhone to my home stereo along with streaming video/pictures from my iPad to my TV.  It worked so well that I bought another one for the office to connect to our 80" TV that we use in our conference room.  We have a lot of internal people with iPads and iPhones that want to show live content from their idevices that it seemed like a no brainer to hook this up.  We also get quite a few external people that show up to our office for meetings with idevices and want to show content on our screen, so again the Apple TV works great for allowing this to happen.A couple of things to note on this application of Apple TV.One, using AirPlay (the mechanism to connect to Apple TV from a iPad/iPhone) to "mirror" your screen to a display/tv will only happen in a 4:3 "like" format for the iPad and an even narrower format for iPhones.  So, if you have a wide screen display (i.e. 16:9 or 16:10) then you iPad screen mirror will only take up the center of the screen with black bars on each side.  The image will rotate along with the respective screen orientation of the iPad, so viewing the iPad in landscape mode will fill more of the screen but not all of the screen.  Not a big deal, just a comment.Two, some iPad/iPhone applications can stream directly to Apple TV in full screen mode without having to use AirPlay "screen mirroring", so you can fill your entire 16:9 wide screen.  For example the YouTube application can do this and fill the entire TV screen.And lastly, some ipad/iphone applications can deny your ability to use AirPlay to stream to your Apple TV.  For example, I was hoping my Xfinity application would allow me to stream movies to my TV but it told me I was not allowed to use AirPlay. :-(Just things to consider if you want to use the Apple TV for video streaming.  Streaming audio to your stereo system works great!  You need an optical digital input on your stereo to do this, so keep that in mind.  You can even stream music from your computer in iTunes over your network.  The Apply TV can connect to your network over Ethernet or WiFi.
